thread.section_title: RI Student Loan Authority/College Planning Center of RI Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of RI Student Loan Authority/College Planning Center of RI | www.risla.com | 3 of 10
thread.title: Stan
thread.title_full: RI Student Loan Authority/College Planning Center of RI reviewed by Stan

author: Stan
title: Stan
text:
In a matter of minutes all the problems with our FAFSA application were fixed. I had been trying to solve the problem of a missing signature for over five months. I had submitted the written paper signature. The rafsa site had sent me in circular request. There was no way to communicate with FSA.
In just a few minutes both our forms were "unlocked" all conflicts resolved and signature accepted. Thankfully just days before the March first deadline.
